definition: of the dull yellowish green of the meat of an avocado, a pear-shaped tropical fruit with green or blackish skin and rich yellowish pulp enclosing a single large seed
details:
adjective
- of the dull yellowish green of the meat of an avocado
noun
- a pear-shaped tropical fruit with green or blackish skin and rich yellowish pulp enclosing a single large seed
= synonyms: alligator pear, avocado pear, aguacate
- tropical American tree bearing large pulpy green fruits
= synonyms: avocado tree
